title: Timeshare: Second Time Around
description: As head of security for Timeshare Unlimited--a very special kind of travel agency--John Surrey can go back to the good old days any time he likes. And in this second installment of the highly-praised series, he takes a voyage to the Roaring '20s...traveling from small-town America to gangland Chicago to the speakeasies of New York City--to find a famous young filmmaker who's gone off in search of the woman he loves...
author: Joshua Dann
